translation.en: If you're watching this, then I'm not around anymore.
translation.de: Wenn du das siehst, bin ich nicht mehr da.

translation.en: I couldn't say any of this to your face. It's too embarrassing.
translation.de: Ich könnte dir das nicht ins Gesicht sagen. Zu peinlich.

translation.en: For you, not for me, obviously.
translation.de: Für dich natürlich, nicht für mich.

translation.en: You're never very good at hearing how lovely you are.
translation.de: Du willst nie hören, wie wunderbar du bist.

translation.en: But you are. You are. You're lovely.
translation.de: Aber das bist du. Ja. Du bist wunderbar.

translation.en: But you're absolutely fucking useless. [chuckling]
translation.de: Aber du bist total scheiß nutzlos.

translation.en: So I thought I'd leave you a little guide to life without me.
translation.de: Da dachte ich, ich hinterlasse dir einen Leitfaden für das Leben ohne mich.

translation.en: You've gotta turn the alarm off in the morning, yeah? If you open the door, it'll set it off,
translation.de: Morgens musst du den Alarm ausschalten. Sonst löst du ihn noch aus,

translation.en: then the alarm company think we're getting broken into.
translation.de: und die Securityfirma hält dich für Einbrecher.

translation.en: If you do set it off, you've gotta ring 'em.
translation.de: Wenn du ihn auslöst, musst du anrufen.

translation.en: The number's in your phone under "alarm." The alarm code is 8645.
translation.de: Nummer ist unter Alarm in deinem Handy. Der Code ist 8, 6, 4, 5.

translation.en: That's your PIN code.
You know this.
And... put it on "perimeter," otherwise the dog will set it off.
translation.de: Und stellt ihn auf Umkreis, sonst löst ihn der Hund aus.

translation.en: And feed the dog, yeah?
First thing in the morning and when you get in from work.
translation.de: Gleich morgens früh und nach der Arbeit.

translation.en: -And what else? -[panting]
Gotta put the bins out Tuesday evenings.
Black bin is household waste, green bin is recy--
translation.de: Die schwarzen Beutel sind Restmüll, die grünen Recycling...

translation.en: ♪ And I know it's gonna be ♪
♪ A lovely day ♪
Where's your bowl? There it is.
translation.de: Wo ist deine Schüssel? Ach, da.

translation.en: Oh, fuck!
-No dog food. -[whines]
Baked beans or vegetable curry?
Thought so.
Oh, sorry.
-I'll get you some real food later. -[whines]
Fuckin' hell.
Vegetable curry for me then.
-Hello. -Hello.
Um, I'm starting here today. I'm starting work here today.
translation.de: Ich fange heute hier an. Ab heute arbeite ich hier.

translation.en: Okay. Do you have a name?
Yes. Sandy.
No, I mean, who are you meant to meet here?
translation.de: Nein, zu wem wollten Sie hier?

translation.en: Who hired you? Oh. Mr. Braden.
Come here. Good girl.
Your dog should be on a lead.
-What? -Dogs should be on a lead.
Can't you read? The park's for everyone.
translation.de: Können Sie nicht lesen? Der Park ist für alle.

translation.en: All right. Oh, sorry.
Thank you. Come here, girl.
Come here. [gasps]
What?! He is not a fat, hairy, nosy cocksucker.
translation.de: Was? Er ist kein fetter, haariger, neugieriger Schwanzlutscher.

translation.en: Bad girl, Brandy.
Sorry about that.
-Disgusting. -See you later.
Good girl.
Right.
I've gotta go to work.
See you later.
I'll bring you some food. Good girl. Good girl.
translation.de: Ich bring dir Futter mit. Braver Hund.

translation.en: Good girl.
Here you go.
What?
It's your post. Put it through the door.
Well, you're here, so it saves me a trip.
translation.de: Sie sind hier, erspart mir den Weg.

translation.en: -I don't wanna walk with it, do I? -Why not?
You're new, aren't you?
Yeah, I was transferred-- No, I don't care.
Presumably in your old round, you put things through the door, didn't you?
translation.de: Aber bei Ihrer alten Runde da haben Sie alles eingeworfen, ja?

translation.en: Mate, there's no need to get lairy.
-Why are you talking to me like this? -You gonna report me?
translation.de: Was reden Sie so mit mir? -Wollen Sie mich melden? -Ja.

translation.en: Yeah. What's your name?
You'll laugh. Trust me.
It's Pat.
Postman Pat? Yeah.
Put it through the door.
That was easy, wasn't it?
-You could've done that. -No, I couldn't.
-Why not? -I'm not a postman.
Go on.
Who's that?
He's my uncle.
[boy] Pedo!
-What? -Pedo!
I'm not a pedo.
And if I was, you'd be safe, you tubby little ginger cunt.
translation.de: Und wenn, wärst du sicher, du fetter kleiner Zimmerbrand.

translation.en: Welcome. Great to have you.
translation.de: Willkommen. Gut, dass Sie da sind.

translation.en: I remember my first day, and it is exciting, isn't it?
translation.de: Ich erinnere mich an meinen ersten Tag. Spannend, was?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah. Great place to work, this.
Very dynamic, lots of people in and out all the time.
translation.de: Sehr dynamisch, viele Leute kommen rein und raus.

translation.en: Really excellent bunch of people.
Hard working.
It's very rewarding as well. You get to go out into the community.
translation.de: Und ein dankbarer Job. Sie kommen raus in die Gemeinde.

translation.en: And that can be anything from local stories, you know,
translation.de: Das kann alles heißen, also Lokalberichte,

translation.en: um... entertainment, finance.
So, yeah.
Kath does the advertising.
Be nice to her, and she might take you to the opening of a new restaurant,
translation.de: Seien Sie nett zu ihr, dann nimmt sie Sie mit zu Restauranteröffnungen und so.

translation.en: give you a free meal. [laughs]
translation.de: dann nimmt sie Sie mit zu Restauranteröffnungen und so.

translation.en: Lenny does all the photography,
so if you're interested in that... Everyone chips in on everything, really.
translation.de: Wenn Sie das interessiert... Eigentlich tragen alle zu allem bei.

translation.en: So what kind of thing are you interested in, would you say?
Um, writing features.
Perfect. That's great.
You'll definitely do that here.
translation.de: Das machen Sie auf jeden Fall.

translation.en: Lots of features. Sky's the limit.
Tony's the head of features. He's not here.
translation.de: Tony ist Chefredakteur. Er ist nicht da.

translation.en: He's a very good writer.
Very smart, very experienced, good guy. Um...
translation.de: Sehr klug, erfahren, ein guter Mann.

translation.en: He's not himself at the minute, to be honest.
translation.de: Im Moment steht er neben sich, ehrlich gesagt.

translation.en: He's had a bit of bad news. Um...
translation.de: Es gab schlechte Nachrichten für ihn.

translation.en: His, er... Tony's my brother-in-law.
Um, he was married to my sister, Lisa,
translation.de: Er war mit meiner Schwester Lisa verheiratet,

translation.en: who died.
Cancer.
-[stuttering] Sorry. -Yeah.
And he was obviously devastated.
Er, suicidal.
Right.
I should warn you, he might...
say a few things that are a bit...
translation.de: er könnte Dinge sagen, die eher...

translation.en: brutal...
at times, so, you know, don't take it personally.
translation.de: Manchmal. Also, wissen Sie, nehmen Sie's nicht persönlich.

translation.en: I mean, you will be working closely with him.
translation.de: Sie werden eng mit ihm zusammenarbeiten.

translation.en: Anyway, er...
-have fun. -[laughs nervously]
Thanks.
So, how are you?
Same.
Bad then?
I've honestly nothing to compare it to anymore.
translation.de: Ehrlich gesagt hab ich keinen Vergleich mehr.

translation.en: But I guess a good day is when I don't go around
translation.de: Aber an guten Tagen laufe ich nicht mehr rum

translation.en: wanting to shoot random strangers in the face and then turn the gun on myself.
translation.de: und will wahllos Fremden die Fresse wegblasen und dann mir selbst.

translation.en: One of my clients
fantasizes about killing his ex-wife...
[whispering] ...when he's masturbating.
-Why are you telling me that? -I didn't say his name.
translation.de: -Wozu erzählen Sie das? -Ich nannte keine Namen.

translation.en: No, I know, but... how does that help me?
translation.de: Ich weiß, aber wie hilft mir das?

translation.en: I dunno.
I guess to let you know you're not the only one.
translation.de: Damit Sie wissen, dass Sie nicht der Einzige sind.

translation.en: Only what?
Well, the only mental case out there.
I mean, you know...
the only guy with mental problems.
-I've got problems. -Go on.
[scoffs] God, man, where do I start?
Maybe start with me, as I'm paying, but...
translation.de: Am besten mit mir, ich zahle ja, aber...

translation.en: -Morning. -Morning.
Terrible, isn't it? Scarred for life.
Hardly scarred for life.
She's 93.
If she lives to 100, she's only been scarred for seven percent of her life.
translation.de: Wird sie 100, war sie nur 7 % ihres Lebens gezeichnet.

translation.en: [woman] You're late.
You're boring.
You're joking, aren't you? I wasn't, but go on. What have you got?
translation.de: -Soll wohl ein Witz sein? -Nein, aber was ist?

translation.en: It's distribution day.
No, I mean, why would you think I was joking about you being boring?
translation.de: Ich meine, warum sollte ich einen Witz gemacht haben?

translation.en: Have you got a... counterargument or...
-Why do you let him get away with this? -I don't. [stuttering]
translation.de: -Warum lässt du das zu? -Tu ich nicht.

translation.en: Tony, come on. What's going on?
translation.de: Tony, komm schon, was ist los?

translation.en: Er, we're putting out a free local newspaper
translation.de: Wir geben eine Gratis-Zeitung raus, die keinen interessiert.

translation.en: -that no one cares about. -No, that's... That's not true.
translation.de: Wir geben eine Gratis-Zeitung raus, die keinen interessiert. Nein, das stimmt nicht.

translation.en: And that's not what... Can you come in my office?
translation.de: Das meinte... Komm bitte in mein Büro.

translation.en: [Tony] Sure.
A lot of people rely on our paper. Not everyone's on Twitter, are they?
translation.de: Unsere Zeitung ist für viele wichtig. Ist ja nicht jeder auf Twitter.

translation.en: Back to work, everyone.
What do you want me to say?
translation.de: Was soll ich sagen? Tut mir leid, ich lass mir was einfallen?

translation.en: That I'm sorry, and I'll buck my ideas up? 'Cause I won't. 'Cause there's no point.
translation.de: Was soll ich sagen? Tut mir leid, ich lass mir was einfallen? Tu ich nicht. Ist sinnlos.

translation.en: Look, Tony, I know that you've had issues,
translation.de: Tony, ich weiß, du hast Probleme,

translation.en: -okay, since you lost Lisa. -Do you reckon...
my wife dying affected me a bit?
translation.de: der Tod meiner Frau setzt mir zu?

translation.en: Of course, and, you know, I get that. I even told Sandy about it.
translation.de: Klar, und das versteh ich. Hab ich sogar Sandy gesagt.

translation.en: Who's Sandy?
The new girl. I didn't want her thinking this place was a madhouse.
translation.de: Die Neue. Sie soll nicht denken, wir sind ein Irrenhaus.

translation.en: I had to say something.
Look, I just need a bit of professionalism around here, okay, Tony.
translation.de: Ich brauche hier nur etwas Professionalität.

translation.en: -Please? -No.
I shouldn't have to explain this to you. You can't just go around being rude to people.
translation.de: Ich sollte dir das nicht erklären müssen. Du kannst nicht alle beleidigen.

translation.en: You can, though. That's the beauty of it.
translation.de: Doch. Das ist ja das Schöne.

translation.en: There's no advantage to being nice and thoughtful
translation.de: Nett und rücksichtsvoll sein, bringt nichts,

translation.en: and caring and having integrity. It's a disadvantage, if anything.
translation.de: Fürsorge und Integrität auch nicht. So was ist eher ein Nachteil.

translation.en: Let's see. If you carry on like this, I might have to let you go.
translation.de: Wenn du so weitermachst, muss ich dich entlassen.

translation.en: No, you won't. You won't, that's what I'm saying, 'cause you're a nice bloke.
translation.de: Wirst du nicht. Das meinte ich. Du bist ein netter Typ.

translation.en: So I'll take advantage of you, like everyone else does here.
translation.de: Also nutze ich dich aus, wie alle anderen hier.

translation.en: -You'll warn me. I'll ignore it. -What?
translation.de: Du verwarnst mich, das ignoriere ich.

translation.en: You'll give me another warning. I'll ignore it. I'll carry on doing what the fuck I want.
translation.de: Du verwarnst mich, ich ignoriere's. Ich mache weiter, was ich will.

translation.en: Eventually, you'll give up, and I'll win.
translation.de: Irgendwann gibst du auf, ich hab gewonnen.

translation.en: The girls here have discovered that you won't even question "women's problems."
translation.de: Die Mädels wissen, dass du Frauenleiden nie infrage stellst.

translation.en: Kath's had three periods this month.
translation.de: Kath hatte diesen Monat dreimal ihre Tage.

translation.en: She likes Fridays off. You do nothing.
translation.de: Sie nimmt freitags gern frei. Du tust nichts.

translation.en: She gets away with it 'cause she's an arsehole.
translation.de: Damit kommt sie durch, weil sie ein Arsch ist.

translation.en: So, I thought, right, let's have a bit of that.
translation.de: Da dachte ich mir, das mach ich auch.

translation.en: Why would you wanna do that? Why wouldn't you just rather get better and be happy?
translation.de: Wieso? Warum willst du nicht, dass es dir besser geht?

translation.en: There's only one thing that'd make me better and happy,
and that's Lisa being around, and that can't happen.
translation.de: wenn Lisa da ist, und das geht nicht.

translation.en: So that's why I nearly killed myself straight away.
translation.de: Deshalb hätte ich mich beinah selbst umgebracht.

translation.en: Right, okay, but you didn't kill yourself, did you?
translation.de: Ok, aber das hast du nicht, oder?

translation.en: So, clearly, you know, something made you stop.
The look on the dog's face.
She was hungry, so I thought I'd better feed her.
translation.de: Der hatte Hunger. Ich musste ihn füttern.

translation.en: It gave me time to think, "I should be dead now." I didn't care.
translation.de: Ich hatte Zeit zum Nachdenken: "Ich sollte tot sein." Es war mir egal.

translation.en: So, everything's a bonus.
If I become an arsehole,
and I do and say what the fuck I want
translation.de: und tue und sage, was ich will,

translation.en: for as long as I want,
and then when it all gets too much, I can always kill myself.
translation.de: und wenn mir alles zu viel wird, kann ich mich abmurksen.

translation.en: It's like a superpower.
That's the worst superhero I've ever heard of.
translation.de: Du bist der mieseste Superheld, den ich kenne.

translation.en: That's the way it is now. [Braden] So what? So...
My job now is to make you happy before you kill yourself?
translation.de: Ich soll dich glücklich machen, bevor du dich umbringst?

translation.en: That's like a constant ticking clock for me now, is it?
translation.de: Da tickt jetzt ständig die Uhr für mich, oder?

translation.en: If you like.
Well, I don't like.
Anyway, that's the way it is.
[Braden] Okay, well, I'm glad we had this chat. [Tony] Yeah, very constructive.
translation.de: -Gut, dass wir uns unterhalten haben. -Ja, sehr konstruktiv.

translation.en: All right, um...
So this is... This is Sandy.
She's just started today. It's her first day, um, so, Tony,
translation.de: Sie hat heute angefangen. Ihr erster Tag. Sie wird unter dir arbeiten.

translation.en: she's gonna be working under you. If you could...
translation.de: Sie wird unter dir arbeiten. Mach sie mit allem vertraut, sag ihr, was Sache ist.

translation.en: show her the ropes, tell her what's what.
translation.de: Mach sie mit allem vertraut, sag ihr, was Sache ist.

translation.en: Here's what's what. Um... humanity is a plague.
translation.de: Die Sache ist die: Die Menschheit ist die Pest.

translation.en: We're a disgusting, narcissistic, selfish parasite,
translation.de: Wir sind ekelhafte, narzisstische, egoistische Parasiten,

translation.en: and the world would be a better place without us.
translation.de: die Welt wäre ohne uns besser dran.

translation.en: It should be everyone's moral duty to kill themselves.
I could do it now. Quite happily just go upstairs,
jump off the roof,
and make sure I landed on some cunt from Accounts.
translation.de: und einen Arsch aus der Buchhaltung treffen.

translation.en: That the sort of thing... you meant?
No.
Just, um... ignore that.
Um, Lenny, can you show Sandy the ropes?
translation.de: Lenny, kannst du Sandy alles zeigen?

translation.en: Sure thing.
[Braden] Gotta get the papers out. Thank you.
translation.de: Die Zeitung muss ja raus. Danke.

translation.en: -[Tony] You showing her the ropes? -[Lenny] Big-time.
Can I guess the bullet points?
Get in. Eat in front of the computer.
translation.de: Komm rein, iss was vor dem Computer.

translation.en: Go to the pub. Eat in front of the quiz machine.
translation.de: Geh in den Pub, iss was vor dem Spielautomat.

translation.en: Go home. Eat in front of the telly.
translation.de: Geh heim, iss was vor der Glotze.

translation.en: Go to bed. I assume you eat in bed?
translation.de: Geh ins Bett, du isst sicher im Bett?

translation.en: I have emergency snacks nearby, yeah.
[sighs] I've gotta go.
Want me to bring you more doughnuts, fat boy? Yes, please.
Do you mind him talking to you like that?
Nah, he's a mate.
It distracts him.
You don't take any shit off him, all right?
I don't, 'cause I'm not weak like him.
translation.de: Tu ich auch nicht, ich bin nicht so schwach wie er.

translation.en: -[Braden] Er, Julian? -[Julian] Yeah.
[Braden] Um, we've had a couple of calls from people
saying that their building didn't get any papers delivered.
translation.de: die sagten, bei ihnen wurde keine Zeitung ausgeliefert.

translation.en: [Julian] Ah. Okay, look, that's weird 'cause I definitely delivered them all.
translation.de: Ok, das ist ja komisch. Ich hab definitiv alle ausgeliefert.

translation.en: You know you've got to ring a buzzer to get into the actual building?
translation.de: Du weißt schon, dass du klingeln musst, um ins Haus reinzukommen?

translation.en: You can't leave them outside.
A lot of the old people can't get up and down the stairs or go out.
translation.de: Viele alte Leute steigen keine Treppen oder gehen raus.

translation.en: Yeah, I know that, boss. I will be extra careful with these.
translation.de: Ja, das weiß ich, Boss. Bei denen passe ich extra auf.

translation.en: Okay.
[clears throat] Um, can I get paid now?
You will do a good job, won't you? You can trust me, yeah.
translation.de: -Du machst deine Arbeit gut, ja? -Sie können mir vertrauen.

translation.en: -[Braden] Thirty-five pounds, right? -Yeah.
[Braden] All right.
Okay.
Hot date?
Sorry, what?
Just saw you washing in a puddle from a drain,
translation.de: Du hast dich in der Pfütze gewaschen.

translation.en: and I wondered if it was a special occasion.
Not really, no.
Gonna buy drugs with that and dump the papers in the skip?
translation.de: Kaufst du dir Stoff und wirfst die Zeitungen in den Müll?

translation.en: Well, I should probably dump them first, then buy the drugs.
translation.de: Ich sollte sie zuerst wegwerfen und dann Stoff kaufen.

translation.en: I'll forget otherwise, won't I?
Where's Lisa?
She's dead, Dad.
Remember? She died earlier this year.
translation.de: Weißt du noch? Sie ist dieses Jahr gestorben.

translation.en: She was here this morning.
No, she wasn't.
[nurse] Hi.
[nurse] Right.
Let's get you sorted, Ray, eh?
translation.de: Kümmern wir uns mal um Sie, Ray.

translation.en: If it was a dog, you'd put it down.
translation.de: Wär's ein Tier, würden Sie es einschläfern.

translation.en: It?
I was sort of being nice, that...
translation.de: Das habe ich nett gemeint, dass...

translation.en: I feel sorry for him.
Well, don't you ever feel sorry for them?
I worry when they cry.
translation.de: Ich mach mir Sorgen, wenn sie weinen.

translation.en: We say there's nothing going on inside to make ourselves feel better,
translation.de: Wir sagen, da drinnen sei nichts mehr los, damit es uns besser geht, aber da ist definitiv noch was.

translation.en: but there's definitely something going on.
translation.de: damit es uns besser geht, aber da ist definitiv noch was.

translation.en: You married?
No time for that. [chuckles] I'll give you a good seeing to.
translation.de: -Dafür ist keine Zeit. -Ich nehm Sie mal ordentlich ran.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
It's all right.
Never heard any complaints.
Kept the wife happy.
I've gotta go.
See you later.
See you, Dad.
Bring Lisa with you.
[Tony] Fuck me!
Yeah, all right.
Jesus Christ!
[Tony] Good girl.
Oh, fuckin' hell.
No bowls.
Fuck's sake.
Of course! No fuckin' milk!
[Lisa] Don't wallow, eh?
Stay active.
And keep our house tidy.
Our lovely house.
And don't get drunk all the time, all right?
translation.de: Und besauf dich nicht dauernd, ok?

translation.en: 'Cause it'll only make you feel worse in the long run.
translation.de: Langfristig geht's dir damit nur noch schlechter.

translation.en: I'm not a doctor,
but I have spoken to loads of 'em over the last few months,
translation.de: aber ich hab in letzter Zeit mit vielen geredet,

translation.en: and they all reckon it's not ideal to be a fat, lazy, self-pitying lump.
translation.de: die finden alle, faule, sich selbst bemitleidende Fettsäcke sind nicht ideal.

translation.en: If you put the dishes straight in the dishwasher, it don't build up.
translation.de: Wenn du Geschirr gleich einräumst, stapelt es sich nicht.

translation.en: And change the salt every now and then.
translation.de: Und wechsle ab und zu das Salz.

translation.en: The salt's in the garage.
translation.de: Das Salz ist in der Garage.

translation.en: The garage is that massive thing on the side of the house.
translation.de: Die Garage ist das große Ding seitlich am Haus.

translation.en: [under breath] Oh, fuck's sake.
You all right, yeah?
I was worried about you.
-Why? -What do you mean, "why"?
You're always talking about killing yourself.
translation.de: Weil du dich ständig umbringen willst.

translation.en: Also, you should be at work, but you know I'll let that slide.
translation.de: Außerdem solltest du im Büro sein, aber Schwamm drüber.

translation.en: Come to the pub. Me and Len are going for lunch.
translation.de: Komm in den Pub. Len und ich essen was.

translation.en: No, I've had lunch.
Come on.
-We used to go to the pub all the time. -No!
Someone will make me angry, and that's the day ruined.
translation.de: Dann ärgert mich jemand, und der Tag ist versaut.

translation.en: Yeah, I'll take that chance, Bruce Banner.
It'll do you good.
Come on, please. All journalists go to the pub for lunch.
translation.de: Komm, bitte. Alle Journalisten essen im Pub.

translation.en: We're not journalists.
We are journalists. We work for a newspaper.
translation.de: Doch. Wir arbeiten für eine Zeitung.

translation.en: Yeah, and that newspaper is used to line cat litter trays
translation.de: Ja, und mit dieser Zeitung werden Katzenklos ausgelegt,

translation.en: by old ladies, once a week. And they read it before they do that.
translation.de: -von alten Damen einmal die Woche. -Und davor lesen sie sie.

translation.en: -We're not journalists. -We are.
-We're journalists. -No, we're not.
-Yes, we are. -Not.
-Stop saying that. We are. -Not.
-Fuckin' hell! -[loud crunching]
Can you hear that?
Fuckin' fat cunt eating like a fuckin' slug.
translation.de: Scheiß Fettsack. Frisst wie 'ne scheiß Nacktschnecke.

translation.en: -Doing my fuckin' head in. -[Braden] All right.
Why don't you throw yourself into your work? -I can't concentrate with that... -[crunching]
translation.de: -Stürz dich doch in die Arbeit. -So kann ich mich nicht konzentrieren.

translation.en: -Fuckin' hell! -[Braden] They're crisps. They're crunchy.
Yeah, but why does he have to do all that "mm mmm"?
translation.de: Aber warum muss er all das...

translation.en: Well, this is fun.
Told you.
You told me? Great.
Always someone who spoils it.
And do you think that might be you on this occasion?
translation.de: Ja, meinst du, in diesem Fall bist du das?

translation.en: -No. -[loud crunching]
-[Tony sighs] -Look, just ignore him, okay?
As I was saying, why don't you throw yourself into your work?
translation.de: Wie ich sagte, wieso stürzt du dich nicht in Arbeit?

translation.en: That's what depressed people do.
Sometimes.
It's hard for me to throw myself into my work, when my work
translation.de: Mir fällt's schwer, mich in Arbeit zu stürzen, wenn ich

translation.en: is often talking to a plumber on the estate
translation.de: oft mit 'nem Klempner aus der Siedlung reden muss,

translation.en: who's grown a potato that looks like Lionel Richie.
translation.de: der 'ne Kartoffel anbaute, die wie Lionel Richie aussieht.

translation.en: That made the front cover. It did look like him, though.
translation.de: -Das war auf dem Titelbild. -Sah wirklich aus wie er.

translation.en: Actually, this is a good time. We've got some exciting leads at the moment.
translation.de: Die Zeiten sind gut. Wir haben viele spannende Hinweise.

translation.en: -Leads? -Yeah.
Like we're Woodward and Bernstein?
-They are leads. -Go on. What leads?
-What "leads" do we have? -All right.
A woman called us. When she drags her dustbin, it sounds like Chewbacca.
translation.de: Neulich rief eine Frau an, ihre Mülltonne klingt wie Chewbacca.

translation.en: -No. -No? All right. Um...
Woman on Blagden Road woke up Chinese.
translation.de: Frau in der Blagden Road wachte als Chinesin auf.

translation.en: And she wasn't before.
No, I get the angle.
Man who got sent the same birthday card five times.
translation.de: Mann bekommt fünf Mal die gleiche Karte zum Geburtstag.

translation.en: -Really? -[Tony] Really?
-[Braden] Yeah. -Right, let's get to the bottom of that
ASAP.
[Braden] Well, yes. Why don't you? 'Cause that is your job.
translation.de: Genau, leg mal los. Das ist nämlich dein Job.

translation.en: -I know. -Yeah.
[Tony] Ring the doorbell.
You... You disgusting-- [Lenny] I didn't wanna do it in his house.
Go to the doctor. You've got bowel cancer.
translation.de: Geh zum Arzt. Du hast garantiert Darmkrebs.

translation.en: -Hello. -Don't come out. This fat cunt's
-shat himself. -Are you from the paper?
Yeah. Leave him there for a while. You fuckin' pig.
translation.de: Ja. Wir lassen ihn draußen. Du alte Drecksau!

translation.en: [man] When I got the first one, I thought, "That's a nice card."
translation.de: Ja, bei der ersten dachte ich: "Schöne Karte."

translation.en: And then I got the second, and I thought, "Oh, that's funny. Two the same!" [laughs]
translation.de: Bei der zweiten dachte ich: "Wie lustig, die Gleiche."

translation.en: [chuckling] But then when I got the third,
I thought, "Well, what are the chances of that?"
Astronomical. And then the fourth...
[man] But then, five... I mean,
I bet that's never happened before.
translation.de: Ich wette, das ist noch nie passiert.

translation.en: Not on record anyway.
-[man] Are you taking notes? -Yeah, all in there.
Is this going to be in next week's newspaper?
translation.de: Kommt das in die Zeitung von nächster Woche?

translation.en: Yeah, we'll rush this through. Quite a scoop.
translation.de: Ja, schaffen wir noch. Was für eine Sensation.

translation.en: Oh, my Denise would be tickled by this.
That's my wife.
She passed away last year.
Light of my life.
Anything that happens, I go to tell her.
translation.de: Alles, was passiert, erzähle ich ihr.

translation.en: Then I remember. Nothing's as good if you don't share it.
translation.de: Und dann fällt mir wieder ein, alles ist besser, wenn man es teilt.

translation.en: Still have my downs,
but then life throws you these interesting little things, doesn't it?
translation.de: aber dann bringt einem das Leben so was Interessantes, was?

translation.en: You can't feel sorry for yourself.
Got to keep going.
Happy birthday.
Oh. Thanks.
[Tony, under breath] Fuck's sake.
Excuse me. Where's the dog food?
It's by the cat food.
[Tony] Right, well...
I've got another question then. Where's the cat food?
translation.de: Dann hab ich noch 'ne Frage. Wo ist das Katzenfutter?

translation.en: Tinned products, aisle two.
Cheers. Don't get up.
Okay.
-[cashier] That everything? -Yeah.
[man] All right, mate. You got any money?
-Yeah. -What?
Yes, I've got money.
Give it to me then.
-Why? -I'll fuckin' kill you if you don't.
translation.de: Wieso? Weil ich dich sonst kaltmache.

translation.en: Does that usually work, does it?
To most people,
the threat of death is worse than giving you money,
translation.de: Für die meisten ist 'ne Todesdrohung schlimmer, als euch Geld zu geben.

translation.en: but...
Or they're worried you'll hurt their family or...
translation.de: Oder sie fürchten, ihr tut der Familie was an.

translation.en: I haven't got any family.
So, I'm not gonna go into it, but I don't care about anything anymore.
translation.de: Ich sag jetzt nichts weiter, aber mir ist alles egal.

translation.en: I'm not giving you any money.
Are you mental?
No, I'm just tired of doing things I don't wanna do,
translation.de: Ich hab's satt, Dinge zu tun, die ich nicht tun will.

translation.en: and we always have a choice.
And if I've read this right,
my choice is either violence
or hand over my money peacefully...
to two useless little cunts.
-Are you mad? [grunts] -[Tony] No.
-Fuck off! Okay? -[man groans]
Just... fuck off.
[Lisa] It's no one's fault what's happened. Don't go blaming the world.
translation.de: Keiner hat Schuld an der Sache. Kreide das nicht der Welt an.

translation.en: You know how grumpy you get when things don't go your way.
translation.de: Du weißt, wie mürrisch du wirst, wenn's nicht nach dir geht.

translation.en: But you've got such a good heart.
translation.de: Aber du hast ein gutes Herz.

translation.en: You're born like it. You can't contrive it. You're just decent.
translation.de: Das steckt in dir. So was plant man nicht. Du bist anständig.

translation.en: I knew it, first time I met you.
translation.de: Das wusste ich bei dir sofort.

translation.en: Hit me like a bolt of lightning.
And I've loved you ever since.
[sighs] You fat twat!
Oh, it's Sunday, you cunt!
translation.de: Oh, es ist Sonntag, du Arsch!

translation.en: [Tony, cackling] You're not a real vicar, I can tell. [Lisa] Oh, Tony!
translation.de: -Du bist kein Pfarrer, das merke ich. -Oh, Tony!

translation.en: [Lisa, screaming] Oh my God!
-[Tony] What? -Why'd you do this to me?
[Tony] It's good for you. It gets your heart going.
translation.de: Weil es dir guttut. Bringt das Herz

translation.en: -It gets your metabolism up. -No! You... [shouts]
